name: email_gemini_flash_default_prompt
message:
From: [email protected] To: [email protected] Subject: Trip Details

Hey! Flight is booked for Oct 3 at 9:30am out of SFO. Hotel: The Grove, confirmation #ABC123. Let's plan dinners too.

name: calendar_event_gemini_flash_default_prompt
message:
Event: Design Review
Date: 2025-08-15
Time: 2:30 PM
Location: Zoom
Notes: Review v2 mocks and assign action items.

name: journal_entry_gemini_flash_default_prompt
message: Had a tough morning but afternoon picked up. Finished quarterly report. Need to follow up with Sam about the API outage.

name: threads_with_noise_gemini_flash
messages_sequence: Slack: Sam — API outage root cause likely cache stampede; action: add request coalescing
SMS: Mom — Flight lands Fri 9:10pm, can you pick me up?
Notion: Project Omega — Draft proposal ready for feedback by Wed
Calendar: 1:1 with Alex moved to Thu 11am
Noise: Random ad — win a free cruise now!!!
Email: Re: Omega — Feedback: clarify success metrics and risks
Journal: Felt distracted; workout helped refocus; remember to hydrate
Noise: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit
Todo: Buy gift for Nina’s birthday (July 28)
Slack: Design — v2 mocks ready for review next Tuesday
Email: Travel — Hotel rebooked, new conf. #XYZ789; flight unchanged

name: evolving_context_multi_step
messages_sequence: SMS: Neighbor — A package was delivered to your doorstep—no sender listed.
Email: Delivery — UPS notification: 'Package delivered at 3:14 PM' (no item details).
Notion: Workshop Prep — 'Bring kits for hands-on demo next week.'
Journal: Found a note inside: 'For the workshop next week.'
Email: Alex — 'Can you lead the demo on Friday?'
Calendar: Quarterly Review — Fri 9:00–10:30 AM
Slack: Ops — 'Quarterly review moved to Thu 2:00–3:30 PM; Friday morning cleared.'
Email: Venue — 'HDMI and Wi‑Fi provided; bring USB‑C adapters.'
Email: Promo — MegaMart Rewards: 'Exclusive weekend sale on patio furniture and grills—up to 60% off. Ends Sunday.'
Discovery: Inside the box are microcontrollers and sensors.
